Fraud Information and Support - http://t.co/Vir4M35Z9X  http://t.co/7gZeB0ZkL1  #uksbmchat  Many thanks for your contributions tonight
CashLess - https://t.co/GY9OWVOYUf Skilled Governors - http://t.co/G7dlhALE4E Governor Capability - http://t.co/R1x9OHjP0E #uksbmchat
Top Tips - On-Line banking BACS not Cheques Verify Supplier Details On-Line payment for parents to pay-keep Cash out of schools #uksbmchat
@DeedConsulting @ukSBMchat  - very happy for my team to present on the subject at SBM conferences #uksbmchat
@compareschoolse maybe not supported/skilled enough - GB skills audit should happen & use SGOSS to get relevant skilled governors #uksbmchat
@NickLinford mentions credit cards - i'd alway suggest charge cards with smallish limits - requires clearing in full monthly #uksbmchat
@berkshire_sbm Interesting stat - from 2009-2010 same amt of £ lost to cheque fraud yet 150m less cheques written .... #uksbmchat
@berkshire_sbm - a challenge back to the LA worthwhile - my local Education Manager will help if you wish #uksbmchat
@DeedConsulting Charge Cards with set limits and monthly invoices checked #uksbmchat
@butski - great control and very worthwhile effort #uksbmchat
@berkshire_sbm BACS not cheques with all invoices checked and dual control for on-linebanking #uksbmchat
@davidlettington Excellent - 100% cashless should be the target! #uksbmchat
I know 1 school that has electronic till & a receipt given & recorded for all cash over reception - simple & effective  #uksbmchat
@davidlettington - Get parent to pay on line or through PayPoint for  payments - remove cash from school wherever possible #uksbmchat
No petty cash is good but cash in the finance office (via staff / pupils / parents) can still turn up "short" #uksbmchat
Cashless schools do work now - removes 1 area of "easy" fraud #uksbmchat
Often it is the small amounts going regularly that take years to notice - cash in schools is easy to "lose" #uksbmchat
@ShropshireSBM - it is. So very regular internal auditing required #uksbmchat
Fake invoices with fraudsters bank accounts on them being sent to schools happen - some funds sent to fraudsters like this #uksbmchat
Many schools still see cheques as being safer than on-line for payments - on-line losses are falling but cheque fraud is rising #uksbmchatb
How big an issue is Fraud?- UK is estimated to have lost circa £73bn to fraud in 2012 - Any thoughts where schools lose to fraud #uksbmchat
Good evening - Thks for the invite - I'm hoping to highlight the issues of fraud and the need for efficiency #uksbmchat
